sentences.en: "Just take it easy," David said. "You'll feel better presently."
sentences.cn: “放松点，”戴维说，“你很快就会觉得更舒服些。”
“谁是阿格尼丝？”——“你很快就会见到她。”

sentences.en: "You're not looking too well, Thomas," he said presently.
sentences.cn: “托马斯，你看起来气色不太好，”他脱口而出。

sentences.en: A little oil presently eats out the color.
sentences.cn: 只要有一点油就会使那颜色褪去.

sentences.en: He is presently living in New York.
He is presently the medical director for the Fellowship of World Christians.
sentences.cn: 他目前是世界基督徒团契的主任医师。

sentences.en: How, and with what result , you shall presently see.
sentences.cn: 究竟如何, 下回分解.

sentences.en: I'll go to see your uncle presently.
sentences.cn: 我一会儿就去看望你叔叔.

sentences.en: Presently George's ankle began to throb with pain.
sentences.cn: 不一会儿，乔治的脚踝就开始一阵阵地疼。

sentences.en: Presently he heard the sound of footsteps.
Presently I got the whole story.
sentences.cn: 我不久便了解到了全部情况.

sentences.en: Presently she became aware of footsteps hurrying after her.
sentences.cn: 她突然发觉身后有脚步声匆忙追来.

sentences.en: The crime is presently being investigated by the police.
sentences.cn: 警方目前正在调查这起案件。

sentences.en: The doctor is presently writing a book.
The doctor will be here presently.
The range of courses presently available has grown.
sentences.cn: 目前可选择的课程范围已经扩大了。

sentences.en: Your case is presently being investigated.
sentences.cn: 你的案子目前正在调查中。
